rooms.description: A welcoming entry with a foyer that adheres to Vastu principles ensuring proper light and energy flow.
Spacious Mediterranean-style living area with natural ventilation, large windows facing east as per Vastu guidelines for prosperity.
Adjacent to the kitchen ensuring a smooth flow of energy and light. The dining area is designed in line with Mediterranean aesthetics and balanced proportions.
A private master suite incorporating Vastu principles by positioning it towards the north-east to attract positive energy. It includes an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet.
A comfortable guest room designed with Mediterranean style features, ensuring privacy while maintaining Vastu harmony.
Dedicated space for the household help, located at a convenient yet separate area of the ground floor, designed to respect privacy and adhere to local building norms.
A utility room for storage and maintenance work. This space is strategically positioned to minimize disruption in main living areas.

openings.description: The main entrance is placed on the south-west side of the plot, ensuring alignment with Vastu guidelines and creating a harmonious flow of energy into the home.
A spacious garage located in the north-east section to ensure easy access while maintaining the aesthetic and structural integrity of the farmhouse.
Dedicated service entrance for deliveries, maintenance, and servants' access, designed to keep these functions separate from the main living areas.

rooms.description: An extra bedroom on the first floor to accommodate family or guests, designed with Mediterranean style and balanced Vastu orientation.
Another bedroom offering privacy and comfort, ensuring proper alignment with energy flows according to Vastu.
A dedicated gym space designed for the bachelor pad, featuring modern equipment and ample ventilation. The placement is chosen based on Vastu principles to optimize positive energy during workouts.
Shared bathroom facilities located conveniently between bedrooms with attention given to natural light and privacy, aligned with local norms.

openings.description: A balcony overlooking the garden providing fresh air and a scenic view, in accordance with Mediterranean aesthetics.
The main staircase connects the ground floor to the first floor, designed ergonomically while respecting spatial harmony and local building codes.
